files.patch:
@@ -379,1 +379,1 @@ -macOS 13.x (Ventura) +macOS 14.x @@ -516,2 +516,2 @@ -

It is recommended that you use at least macOS 13 (Ventura) and Xcode -14, but earlier versions may also work.

+

It is recommended that you use at least macOS 14 and Xcode 15.4, but +earlier versions may also work.

@@ -593,1 +593,1 @@ -Apple Xcode 14.3.1 (using clang 14.0.3) +Apple Xcode 15.4 (using clang 15.0.0)

@@ -178,1 +178,1 @@
-| macOS             | macOS 13.x (Ventura)               |
+| macOS             | macOS 14.x                         |
@@ -330,1 +330,1 @@
-It is recommended that you use at least macOS 13 (Ventura) and Xcode 14, but
+It is recommended that you use at least macOS 14 and Xcode 15.4, but
@@ -396,1 +396,1 @@
-| macOS              | Apple Xcode 14.3.1 (using clang 14.0.3)      |
+| macOS              | Apple Xcode 15.4 (using clang 15.0.0)       |
